mapper.insert: insert into support value(null, #{r_num}, #{pe_num}, #{h_num}, #{c_num}, "지원 접수", "지원 완료", "미열람", now())
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT s.st_num, -- Assuming st_num is the unique identifier in the support table s.r_num, s.pe_num, s.h_num, s.c_num, s.st_result, s.st_support, s.st_open, s.st_write, h.h_title, r.r_name FROM support s JOIN hire h ON s.h_num = h.h_num JOIN register r ON s.r_num = r.r_num WHERE s.c_num = #{c_num};
mapper.update: update support set st_result=#{st_result} where st_num=#{st_num}
update support set st_open='열람' where st_num=#{st_num}
